fields.name: While this card is in your hand:
fields.value:
- At the start of each turn, you will draw 1 card.
 - The drawn card will always be a ❄️ card if your hand size is 7 or above.
- Every ❄️ card you have counts as being **Ethereal**.
- Any attempt to **Freeze** any of your cards will instead add the ❄️ color to them.
